org.sakaiproject.antivirus.api

Interface VirusScanner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ClamAVScanner

    public interface VirusScanner
    provide virus scanning capabilities
    Creation Date: Mar 23, 2005
    Version:
    $Revision: 105077 $
    Author:
    Mike DeSimone, mike.[at].rsmart.com, John Bush

    • Method Summary

      Methods

      check whether the virus scanner is enabled

    • Method Detail

      • getEnabled

        boolean getEnabled()
        check whether the virus scanner is enabled
        Returns:
        true if virus scanning can be performed

      • scan

        void scan(byte[] bytes)
          throws VirusFoundException,
                 VirusScanIncompleteException
        scan byte array for a virus
        Parameters:
        bytes -
        Throws:
        VirusFoundException - if a virus was found
        VirusScanIncompleteException - if virus scan was not completed due to an error

      • scan

        void scan(InputStream inputStream)
          throws VirusFoundException,
                 VirusScanIncompleteException
        Scan the InputStream for viruses
        Parameters:
        inputStream - content to scan
        Throws:
        VirusFoundException
        VirusScanIncompleteException

      • scanContent

        void scanContent(String resourceId)
                 throws VirusFoundException,
                        VirusScanIncompleteException
        Scan a item from content hosting service
        Parameters:
        resourceId - a resource if for an item in contenthosting e.g /content/a434234sdfghsdf
        Throws:
        VirusFoundException
        VirusScanIncompleteException
